meanings.sent1: She always outstays her welcome at parties.
meanings.sent2: He outstays his friends when they hang out.
meanings.sent3: The cat outstays its nap time, always waking up late.
meanings.sent4: Time outstays its welcome, lingering longer than needed.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies outstays in the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.sent1: The student outstays in the library to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The sun outstays in the sky during summer evenings.
meanings.sent3: The joke outstays in everyone's memory, making them laugh again.
meanings.sent4: The melody outstays in your mind, playing on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers outstays in the air, filling the room with fragrance.

meanings.definition: To stay longer than is expected.
meanings.sent1: The guest outstays at the dinner party, chatting with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The rain outstays, delaying the outdoor event.
meanings.sent3: The movie outstays its welcome, dragging on with unnecessary scenes.
meanings.sent4: The memory outstays in your heart, never fading away.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of joy outstays, bringing smiles to faces for days.
